div.p: Our mission is to create a public education system that is culturally responsive, supports academic success, and serves as a gateway to unlocking every child’s unique gifts. Our curriculum fosters curiosity in our scholars and aspires to give them a sense of personal, financial and academic responsibility they can carry with them throughout their lives. Regardless of a scholar’s socio-economic circumstance, we believe a high-quality education should give scholars the ability to know and unlock their power for personal achievement.

img.alt: GSA CONTINUES TO EMPHASIZE WHOLE CHILD COMMITMENT, EXPANDS YOGA AND MINDFULNESS PROGRAM WITH GROWGA

h5.a: GSA CONTINUES TO EMPHASIZE WHOLE CHILD COMMITMENT, EXPANDS YOGA AND MINDFULNESS PROGRAM WITH GROWGA

div.p: GSA introduced yoga and mindfulness to scholars 3 years ago and has continued to expand the program every year since. This year, GSA has partnered with an organization called Growga, and our scholars are learning how intentional movement and mindfulness can...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_has_overlay et_pb_blog_item_1_0 post-10801 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-uncategorized

img.alt: GSA Receives Academic Growth Award From North Carolina for Exceeding 2017-2018 Academic Performance

h5.a: GSA Receives Academic Growth Award From North Carolina for Exceeding 2017-2018 Academic Performance

div.p: GSA received an Academic Growth Award from the North Carolina Department of Public Instruction for the 2017-2018 school year. The award was in recognition of 88.1% of our third through eighth grade scholars in the 2016-2017 school year making at least a year's worth...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_has_overlay et_pb_blog_item_2_0 post-10949 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-news

img.alt: The Bull City Takes on the Nation’s Capital!

h5.a: The Bull City Takes on the Nation’s Capital!

div.p: GSA Eagle Ambassadors recently had an exciting educational experience on an overnight trip to Washington D.C.. Scholars attended the USA Science and Engineering Festival, visited the National Museum of African American History & Culture, saw tons of other...

Global Scholars Academy was designed to connect at-risk Durham area youth to a wide array of intellectual and social capital resources, both “high touch” and virtual.
Learn more...
